description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide for the supply and delivery of lumber to Public Works \\[Government Services Canada (PWGSC).
full_summary:
# EP168-241529 Lumber Delivery: Request for Proposal

### RFP Details

|  Key RFP Details  |  Value  |
|  ---  |  ---  |
|  Solicitation Number  |  WS4569184125  |
|  Tender Closing Date  |  May 29, 2024, 14:00 (EST)  |
|  Expected Contract Start Date  |  July 12, 2024  |
|  Procurement Category  |  Goods and Services (General)  |
|  Product Group Description  |  Wood  |
|  Trade Agreements  |  Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)  |
|  Contracting Entity  |  Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)  |
|  Contact Information  |  Lyland Wiebe (lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)  |

### RFP Description

Canada Buys and Ariba Discovery are hosting this procurement through the Canadian Request for Proposal (RFP) process. Contractors are sought to supply and deliver lumber in accordance with specifications, as outlined in  RFP WS4569184125.

### Important Tendering Information

*   The tender closing date is May 29, 2024, at 14:00 EST.
*   Proposals must conform strictly to the packaging, labelling, and delivery requirements as specified in the tender documents.
*   Tenders received after the deadline will not be accepted.
*   Suppliers must register in the suppliers' database to be eligible for payment from the federal government.
*   We are committed to providing an inclusive and barrier-free recruitment process. If you need any accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know.

### Supporting Documents and Submissions

You can find the RFP documents and any subsequent addenda on [Canada Buys](https://buyapp.Remember to follow the procedure outlined in the tender details for submission and evaluation.

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions or need additional information.
